ygData.msgSnippet: The arrow hits Recon s head but obviously his enemy underestimated him. The arrow shattered into fragments the size of dust. Do you think I can stopped that

The arrow hits Recon's head but obviously his enemy underestimated him. The 
arrow shattered into fragments the size of dust. "Do you think I can stopped 
that easily? I have taken on Protoform X and lived to tell about it, a 
mythical beast like yourself has no chance against me," Recon informs him.


>From: Rudra656@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: Chivtrons' base
>Date: Thu, 8 Mar 2001 21:53:15 EST
>
>::Aerotaur::
>     "Obviously you don't know me very well."  He jumped out of the way
>avoiding the blasts.  It was true that he had to revert to beast mode.  He
>reverted to his winged centaur mode.  He brandished his bladed staff over 
>his
>head again.  He was now taller and stronger than before.  "Are you sure you
>wanted to do that?"  He sets his arm holding the staff straight at Recon.  
>He
>grips his wrist and pulls back to his elbow.  With that he releases a
>glimmering arrow aimed at Recon's head.
